rows.label: qst711902_msg0001
rows.name: It's you all... What is it?

rows.label: qst711902_msg0002
rows.name:
As far as I can perceive,
you haven't performed the
Blade Combo 5 times yet.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0003
rows.name:
A Blade Combo can be performed by
using a level I Special, followed
by a level II or higher Special.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0004
rows.name:
The enemy and location don't matter. I will
perceive it with my ability no matter where
you are, so please show me your skills.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0101
rows.name:
Yes, splendid... It seems
you've performed the Blade
Combo 5 or more times.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0102
rows.name:
I should be able to give
a good report to Gororo...
Ah, that's my Driver.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0103
rows.name:
I can tell him that some
people have splendidly
cleared the "first stage."

rows.label: qst711902_msg0104
rows.name:
Did I not mention it? This test
is merely the first stage...
The real test starts now.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0105
rows.name:
And for skilled people like
you all, I'd like you to take
the next test right away.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0106
rows.name:
I will be waiting here, so when you're
ready, feel free to call on me.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0107
rows.name:
Well then, I have high hopes
for you next time too.
